kDesc
Evil Pilot boots - ideal for crushing your enemies with. [#Legal]
Des bottes de pilote diabolique : parfait pour piétiner vos ennemis. [#Legal]
Böse Pilotenstiefel. Ideal zum Zerquetschen von Feinden. [#Legal]
Le scarpe del Pilota malefico: perfette per mostrare a tutti la tua esagerata cattiveria. [#Legal]
Botas de piloto malvada: ideales para aplastar a tus enemigos. [#Legal]
このシューズは悪の塊だ！着用するだけで、Scribble Shooterのイビルパイロットに大変身！[#Legal]
당신의 홈 친구들에게 진정한 악당이 신는 신발을 보여 주세요.[#Legal]
Stomp around PlayStation®Home in these boots showing everyone how evil you really are.[#Legal]
穿著這對靴在PlayStation®Home裡大步走，讓其他人知道你原來有多邪惡。[#Legal]
